scripts.openapi:gen: if [ -f src/openapi.json ]; then openapi --input src/openapi.json --output src/generated --client fetch --useOptions --useUnionTypes; else echo '⚠️  Skipping generation (no openapi.json)'; fi
scripts.openapi: yarn openapi:pull && yarn openapi:gen && yarn openapi:gen:types
scripts.build: yarn run openapi && if [ -n "$(find src -name '*.ts' -print -quit)" ]; then tsc -p tsconfig.json; else echo '⚠️  Skipping TS build (no TypeScript sources)'; fi
